description: Color scheme for Bachelor thesis plots - algorithms and marker genes

raw_matrix.description: Darker Brown - raw matrix UMI plots

intersection_pyED_CR.description: Mix of pyED (#FFCF3E) and CellRanger (#aa6a5a) - intersection/schnittmenge
intersection_pyED_CR.calculation: Average RGB of pyED and CR

other.description: Random grey - for custom/other algorithms (e.g., self-picked threshold)

spermatocytes.description: Teal - Spermatocytes (meiotic cells) - CHANGED from blue to avoid confusion with rED blue
spermatocytes.note: Changed from blue (#2196F3) to teal to avoid confusion with rED blue (#1D63B4)

peritubular_cells.description: Blue-grey/Slate - Peritubular cells (smooth muscle-like) - CHANGED from brown to avoid confusion with CellRanger brown
peritubular_cells.note: Changed from brown (#795548) to blue-grey to avoid confusion with CellRanger brown (#aa6a5a)

usage_notes.algorithms: Use these colors whenever a specific algorithm or data type appears in plots/figures. These colors are EXCLUSIVE and must not be confused with marker gene colors.
usage_notes.marker_genes: Use these colors when visualizing expression or highlighting specific marker genes for cell populations. These colors are distinct from algorithm colors to avoid confusion.
usage_notes.color_exclusivity: Algorithm colors (especially rED blue #1D63B4 and CellRanger brown #aa6a5a) are EXCLUSIVE and must be immediately recognizable. Marker gene colors have been chosen to avoid similar hues.
usage_notes.colorblind_friendly: All marker gene colors are chosen to be distinguishable for colorblind viewers where possible
usage_notes.intersection: The intersection color (pyED + CR) is calculated as the average RGB of both colors
